channel.title: Ryan's Notes
channel.description: Hello, I'm Ryan Parag - these are my notes about designing in the open and building thoughtful products.

item.title: Building a Community Website
item.description: Aggregating Slack groups and events in my local design community

item.title: Designing an App for Slack Themes
item.description: Learning how to scrap together a web app using React, Tailwind, and Firestore

item.title: Collecting Theme Toggles
item.description: My collection of dark modes, light modes, and everything in between

item.title: A Figma Plugin for Design Tokens?
item.description: Creating a plugin to hand-off design tokens more flexibly and easily

item.title: Designing for Personalization
item.description: What are the ways we can design more personal experiences for users?

item.title: From Figma to Code
item.description: Designing a simple Bitcoin Tracker and translating to code

item.title: Portfolio Redesign
item.description: The design decisions I made when redesigning my portfolio

item.title: Starting the Journey
item.description: Kicking off designing things in the open and sharing the things I build

item.title: Thoughts on Design Tools
item.description: As designers, what are we actually delivering? Mockups? Prototypes?
